nodes.bodyText:
Yes, this fixes it (tested with cross-subscription setup).
One note though: in the freeipa_backup.sh command /usr/local/bin/azcopy login --identity --identity-resource-id [azure-msi] will report auth ok even if azure-msi is "". It might make sense to add a log line what the used msi was. I know it can be read in the config file but could help clarity.
